Ydych chi'n dysgu Cymraeg? Neu ydych chi wedi dysgu Cymraeg?
Beth am greu fideo i S4C Dysgu Cymraeg?
Cyfle perffaith i ymarfer! :)
Rhannwch da chi!#DysguCymraeg #S4CDysguCymraeg #LearnWelsh pic.twitter.com/89219X1tED

— S4C Dysgu Cymraeg (@S4CDysguCymraeg) March 24, 2020

creu - create

perffaith - perfect

Rhannwch da chi - please share

Are you learning Welsh? Or have you learned Welsh? Why not create a video for S4C Learning Welsh? A perfect opportunity to practice! Please share!
